body:
Hello.


I have finally managed to modified the falsecolor script to produce
legends with "round" values instead of the default "in between"
values. And while I was at it I also added an option to clip the
magenta background of full colour plots.


The script and example images are here:


http://sites.google.com/site/tbleicher/radiance/falsecolor2


It is still a csh script so it's no use for Windows (although at some
point I considered rewriting the whole thing in Python. I am really
not a csh man ...)


Regards,
Thomas
